plot: Clarence is a myopic delivery man who retires to the countryside, and goes from one mishap to another due to his short-sightedness
plot_en: Clarence is a myopic delivery man who retires to the countryside, and goes from one mishap to another due to his short-sightedness
plot_es: Clarence is a myopic delivery man who retires to the countryside, and goes from one mishap to another due to his short-sightedness
title: Clarence
